languages.text: "Никому в этом мире не обуздать силу истинных ингир, пожирателей звезд. И если ты считаешь, что тебе поддастся даже малая, заточенная часть одного из них — ты безумен, мон-кай. Безумен и недалек".

"No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."
languages.original_text: "Никому в этом мире не обуздать силу истинных ингир, пожирателей звезд. И если ты считаешь, что тебе поддастся даже малая, заточенная часть одного из них — ты безумен, мон-кай. Безумен и недалек".

traits.locale_text: "No one in the world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you — you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and lacking in foresight."

"No one in the world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you — you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and lacking in foresight."

"No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you — you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

"No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you — you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

"No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

"No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

languages.text: «No hay nadie en este mundo capaz de domar el poder de los verdaderos Yngir, los devoradores de estrellas. Y si crees que una parte pequeña y sellada de uno va a ceder ante ti... eres un loco, mon-keigh. Un loco corto de miras».
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: «No hay nadie en este mundo capaz de domar el poder de los verdaderos Yngir, los devoradores de estrellas. Y si crees que una parte pequeña y sellada de uno va a ceder ante ti... eres un loco, mon-keigh. Un loco corto de miras».

languages.text: « Personne dans ce monde n'est capable de dompter le pouvoir des vrais Yngirs, les dévoreurs d'étoiles. Même un fragment emprisonné de ces êtres ne peut être subjugué et il serait insensé de croire le contraire. Insensé et irréfléchi. »
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: « Personne dans ce monde n'est capable de dompter le pouvoir des vrais Yngirs, les dévoreurs d'étoiles. Même un fragment emprisonné de ces êtres ne peut être subjugué et il serait insensé de croire le contraire. Insensé et irréfléchi. »

languages.text: 「この世界にスター・ディヴァウアー、インギルの真の力を制御できる者など存在しない。もしその小さな、封じられた断片であれば従えられると思っているのなら―お前は狂っている、モン＝ケイ。狂っている上に、短絡的だ」
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: 「この世界にスター・ディヴァウアー、インギルの真の力を制御できる者など存在しない。もしその小さな、封じられた断片であれば従えられると思っているのなら―お前は狂っている、モン＝ケイ。狂っている上に、短絡的だ」

languages.text: "Niemand in dieser Welt ist in der Lage, die wahren Yngir zu zähmen, die Sternenfresser. Und wenn Ihr glaubt, dass selbst ein kleiner, eingesperrter Teil von ihnen sich Euch ergeben würde ... dann seid Ihr verrückt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Verrückt und kurzsichtig."
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: "Niemand in dieser Welt ist in der Lage, die wahren Yngir zu zähmen, die Sternenfresser. Und wenn Ihr glaubt, dass selbst ein kleiner, eingesperrter Teil von ihnen sich Euch ergeben würde ... dann seid Ihr verrückt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Verrückt und kurzsichtig."

languages.text: “这个世界上根本没有任何生物能驯服噬星者真正的力量。如果你以为，噬星者的一小块碎片真的会听从你的命令，那你简直是疯了，猴子。不仅疯了，而且目不视物。”
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界上根本没有任何生物能驯服噬星者真正的力量。如果你以为，噬星者的一小块碎片真的会听从你的命令，那你简直是疯了，猴子。不仅疯了，而且目不视物。”

languages.text: "Bu dünyada kimse yıldız yutanların, yani gerçek Yngirlerin gücünü kontrol edemez. Onların küçük ve tutsak bir parçasının bile sana boyun eğeceğini sanıyorsan delirmiş olmalısın mon-keigh. Ya delirmişsin ya da basiretin bağlanmış."
languages.original_text: "No one in this world is capable of taming the power of the true Yngir, the star devourers. And if you think even a small and imprisoned part of one of them is going to yield to you, you are mad, mon-keigh. Mad and short-sighted."
